results.title: Statins Improve Clinical Outcome After Non-aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Translational Insight From a Systematic Review of Experimental Studies
results.text_hl: Additionally, we differentiate between @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@CVS@@@-related (22/68, 32%) and non-@<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@CVS@@@-related (46/68, 68%) @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@DI@@@ describing a trend toward lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@CVS@@@-related @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@DI@@@ (1/22, 5%) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment (Table 2A).

citations.NLM: Kashefiolasl S, Wagner M, Brawanski N, Seifert V, Wanderer S, Andereggen L, Konczalla J. Statins Improve Clinical Outcome After Non-aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Translational Insight From a Systematic Review of Experimental Studies Front Neurol. 2021;12():620096. PMID: 34054685

results.title: High-Dose Simvastatin Is Effective in Preventing Cerebral Vasospasm after Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Prospective Cohort Study in Korean Patients
results.text_hl: A randomized clinical trial demonstrated that 80 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment significantly reduced the development of @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@vasospasm@@@, but recent multicenter randomized trial to assess the effects of 80 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ failed to demonstrate a reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@cerebral vasospasm@@@ compared with 40 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Woo SW, Kim JH, Kang HI, Kim DR, Moon BG, Kim JS. High-Dose Simvastatin Is Effective in Preventing Cerebral Vasospasm after Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Prospective Cohort Study in Korean Patients J Korean Neurosurg Soc. 2015 Oct;58(4):328-33. PMID: 26587185
citations.BibTeX: @article{26587185, title={High-Dose Simvastatin Is Effective in Preventing Cerebral Vasospasm after Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Prospective Cohort Study in Korean Patients}, author={Woo SW and Kim JH and Kang HI and Kim DR and Moon BG and Kim JS}, journal={J Korean Neurosurg Soc}, volume={58}, number={4}, pages={328-33}}

results.title: [Simvastatin efficacy in vasospasm treatment in patients after aneurysm SAH].
results.journal: Zh Vopr Neirokhir Im N N Burdenko
results.text_hl: Aim of the current study was to assess effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@vasospasm@@@ in clinical practice.

results.title: Systemic administration of simvastatin after the onset of experimental subarachnoid hemorrhage attenuates cerebral vasospasm.
results.text_hl: Systemic administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ after the onset of experimental @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@subarachnoid hemorrhage@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@cerebral vasospasm@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin reduces vasospasm after aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage: results of a pilot randomized clinical trial.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@vasospasm@@@ after @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage@@@: results of a pilot randomized clinical trial.

results.title: Simvastatin increases endothelial nitric oxide synthase and ameliorates cerebral vasospasm resulting from subarachnoid hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ increases endothelial nitric oxide synthase and ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@cerebral vasospasm@@@ resulting from @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@subarachnoid hemorrhage@@@.

results.title: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled pilot study of simvastatin in aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: Angiographically-confirmed @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@vasospasm@@@ occurred in 8/20 placebo and 5/19 @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated subjects.

results.title: Simvastatin treatment duration and cognitive preservation in experimental subarachnoid hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ would improve vestibulomotor function and reduce @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive dysfunction@@@ after experimental @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@SAH@@@ in the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@, and explored the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@vasospasm@@@ and regional cerebral blood flow (rCBF).

citations.NLM: Takata K, Sheng H, Borel CO, Laskowitz DT, Warner DS, Lombard FW. Simvastatin treatment duration and cognitive preservation in experimental subarachnoid hemorrhage. J Neurosurg Anesthesiol. 2009 Oct;21(4):326-33. PMID: 19955895

results.title: Simvastatin for the prevention of symptomatic cerebral vasospasm following aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage: a single-institution prospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ for the prevention of symptomatic @<m>DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@cerebral vasospasm@@@ following @DISEASE_Subarachnoid_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D013345 @@@aneurysmal subarachnoid hemorrhage@@@: a single-institution prospective cohort study.
